# fontColor()

**Instance Method**

Returns the font color used in the text field of the annotation.

## Declaration

```swift
func fontColor() -> NSColor!
```

## Return Value

The font color used in the text field of the annotation.

## Related Documentation

- **PDFAnnotationFreeText**: A `PDFAnnotationFreeText` object displays text on a page.

## Managing Font and Font Color

- **font()**: Returns the font used for the annotation’s text field.
- **setFont(_:)**: Sets the font used in the text field of the annotation.
- **setFontColor(_:)**: Sets the font color used in the text field of the annotation.
